## Data Setup

```{r setup, message=FALSE}
#| code-fold: show

library(dplyr)
library(scda)
library(tern)

adpp <- synthetic_cdisc_dataset("latest", "adpp")

adpp <- adpp %>%
  filter(PPSTINT != "NA" & PPENINT != "NA") %>%
  mutate(PPINT = factor(paste0(gsub("[PH]", "", PPSTINT), "-", gsub("[PH]", "", PPENINT))))
```
